OperationModifiers

public struct OperationModifiers: OptionSetType

Represents modifiers used to change the behavior of a query operation. These are bit-flag values that can be combined and otherwise manipulated with bitwise operators.

  • rawValue

    The raw UInt32 value representing the receiver’s bit flags.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let rawValue: UInt32
  • init(rawValue:)

    Initializes a new ASLQueryObject.OperationModifiers value with the specified raw value.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(rawValue: UInt32) { self.rawValue = rawValue }

    Parameters

    rawValue

    A UInt32 value containing the raw bit flag values to use.
  • None

    An ASLQueryObject.OperationModifiers value wherein none of the bit flags are set.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let None = OperationModifiers(rawValue: 0)
  • CaseInsensitive

    Specifies that the query operation should perform case-insensitive matching. Equivalent to ASL_QUERY_OP_CASEFOLD.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let CaseInsensitive = OperationModifiers(rawValue: UInt32(ASL_QUERY_OP_CASEFOLD))
  • MatchPrefix

    Specifies that the query operation will attempt to match the search value against the beginning of each record’s value for the given key. Equivalent to ASL_QUERY_OP_PREFIX.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let MatchPrefix = OperationModifiers(rawValue: UInt32(ASL_QUERY_OP_PREFIX))
  • MatchSuffix

    Specifies that the query operation will attempt to match the search value against the end of each record’s value for the given key. Equivalent to ASL_QUERY_OP_SUFFIX.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let MatchSuffix = OperationModifiers(rawValue: UInt32(ASL_QUERY_OP_SUFFIX))
  • MatchSubstring

    Specifies that the query operation will attempt to find the search value within each record’s value for the given key. Equivalent to ASL_QUERY_OP_SUBSTRING.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let MatchSubstring = OperationModifiers(rawValue: UInt32(ASL_QUERY_OP_SUBSTRING))
  • MatchNumeric

    Specifies that the query operation will perform numeric instead of text comparison. The query operation will interpret the search value and each record value as integers before performing the comparison operation. Equivalent to ASL_QUERY_OP_NUMERIC.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let MatchNumeric = OperationModifiers(rawValue: UInt32(ASL_QUERY_OP_NUMERIC))
  • MatchRegex

    Specifies that the query operation will perform regular expression matching. The query operation will interpret the search value as a regular expression that will be applied against the each record’s value for the given key. Equivalent to ASL_QUERY_OP_REGEX.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static let MatchRegex = OperationModifiers(rawValue: UInt32(ASL_QUERY_OP_REGEX))
